title: welcome to china
body: u ciriticise 4 of premade chinese kids, they will gonna report u + use all chat to make opponent team to report becuz u r good player and their jgler dont give a fuck about ur lane and make other lanes still lose . THank god the time has arrived

replies.body: Its ok, Riot know these chinese trolls are a big problem and are starting to crack down on them
It's like he used google translate to write this, the youtube version
